Source: Head of International Cooperation Department of Romania 's Nuclearelectrica Teodor Chirica

text: Head of International Cooperation Department of Romania 's Nuclearelectrica Teodor Chirica says that the VVER - 1000 technology to be contributed by Russian experts is accepted in the world because is coated for protection and built on US and German supervision and automation systems . " The Russians have just concluded contracts for the export of four similar reactors , two each to China and India , " Chirica told daily Ziarul Financiar on Thursday [ 28 February ] .
